casebody.data:
State
v.
Antwan Anthony 324A16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 1, 2016 Kathryn L. VandenBerg, Attorney at Law, for Anthony, Antwan. *796Kimberly Robb, Assistant District Attorney, Robert C. Montgomery, Special Deputy Attorney General, Kimberly S. Robb, District Attorney, for State of N.C.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 31st of August 2016 by Defendant for Extension of Time to Prepare Trial Transcript:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 1st of September 2016."

Court reporter shall have up to and including the 21st day of October 2016 to prepare and deliver transcript to counsel.
